name: One Man And His Droid II
overview: Follow-up to One Man and His Droid. The game was written but the author was unable to find a publisher for it. Full details are given on Clive Brooker's website. Basically, he sent it to a number of publishers but none were interested. Virgin Mastertronic advised him that the game was very good but publishing Spectrum software was no longer commercially viable. He finally released it himself on the Internet in 2001.
